name: frontend-lib
description: A library containing the frontend components.

scripts.build-development: webpack --config webpack.development.js && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run repackage
scripts.build-production: webpack --config webpack.production.js && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run repackage
scripts.repackage: rm -f frontend-lib-1.0.0.tgz && npm pack && tar -xf frontend-lib-1.0.0.tgz -C . && rm frontend-lib-1.0.0.tgz && mkdir -p ../.build && rm -rf ../.build/frontend-lib && mv package ../.build/frontend-lib
scripts.check: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly false --noEmit && jest --config jest.config.js && eslint --config .eslintrc.js --ignore-path ../.gitignore --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0 'src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' && stylelint --config .stylelintrc.js '**/*.{scss,tsx}'

author: Stephan Boyer
